snippet: Sexual Minorities Uganda said that Scott Lively conspired with local leaders to create hysteria that resulted in persecution of gay Ugandans.
abstract: Ugandan gay rights group Sexual Minorities Uganda files federal lawsuit against American evangelist Scott Lively, accusing him of violating international law by inciting the persecution of gay men and lesbians in Uganda.

byline.contributor: Josh Kron contributed reporting from Kampala, Uganda.

lead_paragraph: Sexual Minorities Uganda said that Scott Lively conspired with local leaders to create hysteria that resulted in persecution of gay Ugandans.
